completeListOfAbilities.name: 怒りの烙印
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
味方全員に自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRV加算
加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
その後 追加HP攻撃
与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP中回復
回復量の上限は それぞれの最大HPの20％分
自身に3ACTION「古代種の系譜」付与
行動負荷が低い
「古代種の系譜」付与中
通常「BRV攻撃」「BRV攻撃＋」が
「BRV攻撃＋＋」に
通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋」が
「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化

ailments.name: Ancient Lineage
ailments.desc: Ancient Lineage: Raises party's ATK、 amount stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV (does not stack)

passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK for 1 turn upon taking HP damage
passives.short_desc: HP Damage Attack: Raises ATK

passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Healing Wind
passives.short_desc: Quick Healing Wind: Raises turn rate of Healing Wind

passives.desc: Slightly recovers more HP with heals
passives.short_desc: Greater Rejuvenate: Raises HP recovery amount

passives.name: Bravery Critical Hit
passives.desc: Slightly raises BRV upon unleashing a critical BRV attack
passives.short_desc: Bravery Critical Hit: Gains BRV

passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Prayer of Cetra
passives.short_desc: Quick Prayer of the Cetra: Raises turn rate of Prayer of the Cetra

passives.name: Buffed Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buffed Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Wish Upon a Star
passives.desc: Low chance 3 turns MAX BRV Up I with BRV Attack\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Wish Upon a Star: Grants MAX BRV Up to self

passives.name: Midgar Flower
passives.desc: Allies: Slightly raises INT BRV、 DEF when own HP is MAX
passives.short_desc: Midgar Flower: Raises INT BRV、 DEF of allies

passives.name: BRV Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV while HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: BRV Boost: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Healing Wind Extension
passives.desc:
Healing Wind use +1

When using Healing Wind:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own ATK
 • Slightly increased HP recovery based on ATK
 • Moderate INT BRV Up boost
 • Higher turn rate
passives.short_desc: Healing Wind Extension: Boost to Healing Wind

passives.name: Speed Buff
passives.desc: Moderately raises SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.name: Prayer of the Cetra Extension
passives.desc:
When using Prayer of the Cetra:
 • Grants target BRV、 increases own BRV based on own INT BRV
 • Slightly increased HP recovery based on target's MAX HP
 • Slight Cetra's Favor boost、 additional MAX BRV Up I、 MAG ATK Up III effect、 duration +1
 • 9 turns slight boost to ATK Up
 • Higher turn rate

When using BRV Attack+:
 • Slight BRV damage boost

While Cetra's Favor active:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on MAX BRV; magic BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; higher turn rate)
passives.short_desc: Prayer of the Cetra Extension: Boost to Prayer of the Cetra

passives.name: Tenacity Resonance
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's INT BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Tenacity Resonance: Raises party's INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: All BRV Regen Attack Extension
passives.desc: When using All BRV Regen Attack:\n • Marginal raised ATK boost\n • Slight BRV Regen boost
passives.short_desc: All BRV Regen Attack Extension: Boost to All BRV Regen Attack

passive.name: All BRV Regen Attack Growth
passive.desc: All BRV Regen Attack use +1\n\nAll BRV Regen Attack effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: All BRV Regen Attack Growth: Boost to All BRV Regen Attack

passive.name: Supernova
passive.desc:
When using Healing Wind:
 • Boost to BRV granted to party
 • Increased party HP recovery
 • Boost to INT BRV Up granted to party、 duration+

passive.name: Ancestral Arts
passive.desc:
Prayer of the Cetra use +1
Target: Recovers more HP
Cetra's Favor boost
Self: 4 turns ATK Up II
passive.short_desc: Ancestral Arts: Boost to Prayer of the Cetra

passive.name: Conversant with the Planet
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Fury Brand
passive.short_desc: Conversant with the Planet: May equip Fury Brand

passives.name: Quick Fury Brand
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Fury Brand
passives.short_desc: Quick Fury Brand: Raises turn rate for Fury Brand

passives.name: Fury Brand Preserve
passives.desc: Enemy attacks will not reduce HP below 1 while own HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: Fury Brand Preserve: Prevents HP from dropping below 1 with sufficient HP

passives.name: Fury Brand Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Fury Brand
passives.short_desc: Fury Brand Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Fury Brand

passive.name: 星と語り合う一族エクステンド
passive.desc: EXアビリティ「怒りの烙印」の性能アップ
passive.short_desc: 星と語り合う一族エクステンド：「怒りの烙印」の性能アップ

passives.name: 怒りの烙印アドバンスチェインHPヒールプラス
passives.desc:
「怒りの烙印」使用時
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
・使用後 追加HP攻撃が発動
・与えたHPダメージに応じて味方全員のHP中回復
　回復量の上限はそれぞれの最大HPの20％分
passives.short_desc: 怒りの烙印アドバンスチェインHPヒールプラス：「怒りの烙印」の性能アップ

passives.name: 星と語り合う一族エクステンドアタックブーストアップ
passives.desc: EX+武器「ミスリルロッド(VII)+」または\nパッシブ「星と語り合う一族エクステンド」装備時\n自身の最大BRV大アップと攻撃力中アップ
passives.short_desc: 星と語り合う一族エクステンドアタックブーストアップ：最大BRVと攻撃力がアップ

passives.name: セトラの祈り＆怒りの烙印バフスタートバフアップロング
passives.desc:
「古代種の系譜」に
味方全員の加算したBRVを
最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップの効果追加

クエスト開始時 
自身に9ACTION「セトラの加護」「攻撃力大アップ」
6ACTION「古代種の系譜」付与

「怒りの烙印」使用時
「古代種の系譜」の3ACTION期間延長
passives.short_desc: セトラの祈り＆怒りの烙印バフスタートバフアップロング：「セトラの祈り」の性能アップ

passives.name: 怒りの烙印BRVアップヒットプラスリキャストアップ＋＋＋
passives.desc:
「怒りの烙印」の
リキャストスピードを小アップ

「怒りの烙印」使用時
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・3HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃に変化
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分

「古代種の系譜」付与中
・「BRV攻撃＋＋」が「BRV攻撃＋＋＋」に変化し
　BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も中アップ
・「HP攻撃＋＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋＋」に変化し
　加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
passives.short_desc: 怒りの烙印BRVアップヒットプラスリキャストアップ＋＋＋：「怒りの烙印」の性能アップ
